data.text:
The summer training camp has finally begun. 
As I stood with Curren Chan I felt the 
overwhelmingly harsh heat of the sun upon us…
data.processed:
󠁿The summer training camp has finally begun. 
󠁿As I stood with Curren Chan I felt the 
󠁿overwhelmingly harsh heat of the sun upon us…

data.text:
It's so hot… 
My energy is draining away…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿It's so hot… 
󠁿My energy is draining away…

data.text:
I'm really bad with the heat… 
I'm gonna fall over and melt…
data.name: Curren Chan

choices.text:
Let's do our best, 
but be sure to not overdo it.
choices.processed:
<size=35>Let's do our best, 
but be sure to not overdo it.</size>

data.processed:

data.text:
So… If I work hard, would 
you take me on a date as a reward?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿So… If I work hard, would 
󠁿you take me on a date as a reward?

data.text:
There's a summer festival being held tonight. 
If you promise to go with me, I think I'll be okay…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿There's a summer festival being held tonight. 
󠁿If you promise to go with me, I think I'll be okay…

data.text: Ehehe, I'm so excited for the summer festival♪
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Ehehe, I'm so excited for the summer festival♪

data.text:
As promised, she pushed through the blistering heat… 
Or rather, it seemed more like the heat wasn't having 
any effect on her as she trained. But a promise is a promise…

They're so red, round, and shiny! 
They're so cute! I want one!

Mister! I'd like a candy apple, please. 
Also, may I take a picture with you in your stand?

Oh, what a cute young lady! Of course,

Yay, thank you so much.

Of course, your bright smile 
reminds me of home, young lady. Plus…

Having you eat my candy apples is the

Heehee♪ Then, don't mind

Thanks to all of this Curren Chan seemed to be 
in a great mood, happily enjoying the festival, until…

data.name: Curren Chan

data.text: (Fyuuuuuu… BANG!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Fyuuuuuu… BANG!)

data.text: Kyaa…!?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Kyaa…!?

data.text:
Ah… Fireworks…? 
Ehh, I didn't know they had those here…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Ah… Fireworks…? 
󠁿Ehh, I didn't know they had those here…

data.text: Yeah… They are…

Amazing! The fireworks are like super beautiful! 
They're hella chic!

󠁿Amazing! The fireworks are like super beautiful! 
󠁿They're hella chic!

data.text: Wow, they really went all out this year, huh? Tamaya!!!!
data.name: Elder Stallkeeper
data.processed: 󠁿Wow, they really went all out this year, huh? Tamaya!!!!

data.text:
Fireworks bursting throughout the night sky. 
I looked around and noticed that everyone at the 
festival was looking up to the sky at them. However…
data.processed:
󠁿Fireworks bursting throughout the night sky. 
󠁿I looked around and noticed that everyone at the 
󠁿festival was looking up to the sky at them. However…

data.text:
Under the light of the fireworks it seemed 
like something was bothering Curren Chan.
data.processed:
󠁿Under the light of the fireworks it seemed 
󠁿like something was bothering Curren Chan.

data.text: Onee-chan, can we leave?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Onee-chan, can we leave?

data.text: Onee-chan, can we leave?
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Onee-chan, can we leave?

data.text:
With her back to the fireworks, 
Curren Chan walked away absent-mindedly.
data.processed:
󠁿With her back to the fireworks, 
󠁿Curren Chan walked away absent-mindedly.

data.text: Before I knew it, we were standing on the beach.
data.processed: 󠁿Before I knew it, we were standing on the beach.

data.text: The thing is… I don't really like… fireworks…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿The thing is… I don't really like… fireworks…

data.text:
That was the last thing I expected her to say. 
She usually never says anything negative, 
so to hear her say that she didn't like something…
data.processed:
󠁿That was the last thing I expected her to say. 
󠁿She usually never says anything negative, 
󠁿so to hear her say that she didn't like something…

data.text:
You see, when fireworks go off everyone looks 
up and stares at them, right? They do that despite 
me being right here in front of them…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿You see, when fireworks go off everyone looks 
󠁿up and stares at them, right? They do that despite 
󠁿me being right here in front of them…

data.text:
Fireworks explode so glamorously and in such a loud bang, causing 
everyone to obsessively stare at them. In other words, all of 
their attention is being stolen away from me.
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Fireworks explode so glamorously and in such a loud bang, causing 
󠁿everyone to obsessively stare at them. In other words, all of 
󠁿their attention is being stolen away from me.

data.text:
When I was a kid, fireworks would make me so 
frustrated that I'd end up crying. So that's why I decided…
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿When I was a kid, fireworks would make me so 
󠁿frustrated that I'd end up crying. So that's why I decided…

data.text:
I decided that I would become 
cuter than any firework out there!!
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿I decided that I would become 
󠁿cuter than any firework out there!!

data.text:
I won't continue to lose to fireworks. 
Instead, I'll bloom into a huge, beautiful flower myself!
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿I won't continue to lose to fireworks. 
󠁿Instead, I'll bloom into a huge, beautiful flower myself!

data.text:
Then I'll be able to steal back everyone's attention, forcing 
them to obsess over me instead. I'm going to make everyone around 
the world fall in love with me.
data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed:
󠁿Then I'll be able to steal back everyone's attention, forcing 
󠁿them to obsess over me instead. I'm going to make everyone around 
󠁿the world fall in love with me.

data.text:
Her dream seems a bit grandiose, however, the way she spoke was 
filled with undeniable confidence. She suddenly fell silent, 
staring at me as if challenging me.
data.processed:
󠁿Her dream seems a bit grandiose, however, the way she spoke was 
󠁿filled with undeniable confidence. She suddenly fell silent, 
󠁿staring at me as if challenging me.

data.name: Curren Chan
data.processed: 󠁿Hey, Onee-chan. I'm…

Her eyes shined so brightly that it made me forget the sounds 
of the fireworks as well as the faint moonlight falling upon us.

You've finally done it… You finally called me 
"cute" from the bottom of your heart, Onee-chan♪
data.name: Curren Chan

󠁿You've finally done it… You finally called me 
󠁿"cute" from the bottom of your heart, Onee-chan♪

data.text:
You've finally done it… You finally called me

Onee-chan, you've been obsessing over me lately, huh?

Nope, you won't be getting away from me! 
You'll be staying with me until I've had my fill, right?

Cause if you stay, you'll get to

data.processed:
󠁿Cause if you stay, you'll get to 
󠁿have me all to yourself tonight… Teehee♪

data.text:
Perhaps Curren Chan was toying with me again. 
Or maybe she was simply trying to make me call her cute again.
